intro: Vangueria randii subsp. randii, commonly known as the Cape daisy, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae and is characterized by its showy yellow flowers and linear, aromatic leaves. The plant typically grows in sandy or rocky soils and is adapted to dry, Mediterranean climates. It produces small, oval-shaped fruits that contain numerous seeds. Vangueria randii subsp. randii is often used in ornamental gardening due to its attractive appearance and drought tolerance.
